name: A Little Bird Told Me
description:
Game developed for the GitHub Game Off 2022

Theme: Cliché 

The Kingdom of Earauthain needs a new Maester Bird Caretaker and the King has requested you to take this role.

You will soon find that your task is much more than taking care of the Royal Aviary: the birds are secretly being sent with letters all are around the Kingdom. 

Take advantadge of your position to help Earauthain 

Credits 

Code, Concept and Direction - Berny Cantos

Art - Babs

Story and FX - Sergi Olives

Music Producer - Alex Petshaft
